class.name: X509Certificate
class.description: The X509Certificate class represents an X509 certificate. Certificates can be loaded and saved like any other [Resource]. They can be used as the server certificate in [method StreamPeerSSL.accept_stream] (along with the proper [CryptoKey]), and to specify the only certificate that should be accepted when connecting to an SSL server via [method StreamPeerSSL.connect_to_stream].

method.name: save
method.description: Saves a certificate to the given [code]path[/code] (should be a "*.crt" file).
